mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_SQ_PK, M.MEM_NICKNM, M.MEM_ID, FRG.FRBRD_GRP_SQ_PK, FRG.AUTH_GRP_FK, FRG.FRBRD_GRP_REG_DT, FRG.HITS, O_FR.FRBRD_TITLE FROM FRBRD_GRP_TB AS FRG LEFT JOIN MEM_TB AS M ON(FRG.MEM_FK = M.MEM_SQ_PK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FR.FRBRD_SQ_PK, FR.FRBRD_GRP_FK, FR.FRBRD_TITLE FROM FRBRD_TB AS FR INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(FRBRD_SQ_PK) AS MAX_SEQ FROM FRBRD_TB GROUP BY FRBRD_GRP_FK ) AS M_FR ON(FR.FRBRD_SQ_PK = M_FR.MAX_SEQ) ) AS O_FR ON(FRG.FRBRD_GRP_SQ_PK = O_FR.FRBRD_GRP_FK) ORDER BY FRG.FRBRD_GRP_SQ_PK DESC LIMIT ${start}, ${pagesize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FRBRD_TB( FRBRD_GRP_FK, FRBRD_REG_DT, FILE_GRP_FK, FRBRD_TITLE, FRBRD_BODY )VALUES( #{freeboardGroupNo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{fileGroupNo}, #{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardBody} )
mapper.select: SELECT FIG.FILE_GRP_SQ_PK FROM FRBRD_GRP_TB AS FRG INNER JOIN FRBRD_TB AS FR ON(FRG.FRBRD_GRP_SQ_PK = FR.FRBRD_GRP_FK) INNER JOIN FILE_GRP_TB AS FIG ON(FR.FILE_GRP_FK = FIG.FILE_GRP_SQ_PK) WHERE FRG.FRBRD_GRP_SQ_PK = #{freeboardGroupNo}
